\[
\frac{N}{M} = \frac{k!}{n!(k-n)!} \cdot \frac{(k-n)!}{n!(k-2n)!} = \frac{k!}{(k-2n)! \cdot (n!)^2}

\[
\boxed{\frac{(k-n)!}{(k-2n)! \cdot n!}}
\]
